fileIO.openReadingError: Strype ran into an internal error when opening the file (reading content issue).

fileIO.writingFileFailed: the file "{filename}" could not be written. (error: {error})
fileIO.fileAlreadyExists: the file "{filename}" already exists (a file opened with the 'exclusive creation' mode cannot exist).
fileIO.closeInternalError: Strype ran into an internal error when closing the file (file could not be found).
